name: Stuff Industry
description:
This game was made for the mini jam 113, the second jam I done.

In this game, you are an employee of an industry and have to execute assignements gave by some peoples and your boss. But there are some bad things happening in this industry, you need to discover what happen here.

This is an interactive story, follow along to discover what happen.

Note that i'm french so I made my best to write everything in english. And its my second finished game so the quality may not be as good as you expect (I'm not an artist).

Good luck ^^.
